forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 36F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening changing to mainly rain showers overnight. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain or snow showers in the evening will give way to partly cloudy skies late. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Clear skies later. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 32F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 30F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early, then a light mix of wintry precipitation late. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early, then a light mix of wintry precipitation late. Low 21F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable.
